thread.title: Dale Earnhardt Jr., Kevin Harvick, Kyle Busch react to wild XFINITY crashes
thread.title_full: Dale Earnhardt Jr., Kevin Harvick, Kyle Busch react to wild XFINITY crashes

title: Dale Earnhardt Jr., Kevin Harvick, Kyle Busch react to wild XFINITY crashes
text:
Feb 25, 2017 at 5:33p ET 0Shares 
After 27 different cars were involved in two major crashed in the Powershares QQQ 300 NASCAR XFINITY Series race at Daytona International Speedway, it didn’t take long for some of the sport’s stars to weigh in. 
Check out Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s reaction to a Tweet from Kyle Busch and comments from Kevin Harvick in the FS1 television booth. We’d say these are definitely on point. Nasty wrecks. Glad no one is seriously hurt so far. I hope tomorrow we don't shovel money into a fire pit. https://t.co/sK1LZu9ctL 
— Dale Earnhardt Jr. (@DaleJr) February 25, 2017 This race and gif looks awfully familiar. @DaleJr pic.twitter.com/TjrQOfXr4o 
— Kyle Busch (@KyleBusch) February 25, 2017 Agree with Happy. Just mistakes/plates. Never been a good combo. https://t.co/RKQFjrUSOW
